reqs: Pre-reqs: All of NURS 300, NURS 310, NURS 321, NURS 330, NURS 360.
courseName: Theoretical Perspectives in Nursing: Infants, Children, Youth and their Families
description: Analysis and application of theories, concepts, evidence and competencies guiding professional nursing practice with infants, children, youth and their families in a variety of practice settings and contexts. Students who take NURS 346 cannot earn credit for NURS 334 or NURS 423
